00018     internal class Program
00019     {
00020         #region Loop / Console / TrapSIGNTerm
00021         public static int sleep = 50; // Speed of Operation
00022 
00023         [DllImport("Kernel32")]
00024         public static extern bool SetConsoleCtrlHandler(HandlerRoutine Handler, bool AddToReceiveQueud);
00025         public delegate bool HandlerRoutine(Ctrl_Types CtrlType);
00026 
00027         //MultiThread Console Command
00028         private static Thread ThreadCaptureConsoleCommand = new Thread(new ThreadStart(CaptureConsoleCommand));
00029 
00030         //Used to Stop The Program and is Thread!
00031         public static bool MainRun = true;
00032         #endregion
00033 
00034         #region Timer For Main Loop
00035 
00036         private static long ticks = DateTime.Now.Ticks;
00037         private static uint diff = 0;
00038         
00039         #endregion
00040 
00041         public static sLog Log;
00042 
00043         [MTAThread]
00044         public static void Main()
00045                 {
00046             //Start the log System
00047             if (!sLog.Init()) return;
00048             Log = new sLog();
00049 
00050             //Console Trap CTRL-C
00051             Console.CancelKeyPress += new ConsoleCancelEventHandler(DisgraceExit);
00052             SetConsoleCtrlHandler(new HandlerRoutine(DisgraceExit), true);
00053 
00054             //Remove Unhandle Exception
00055             AppDomain.CurrentDomain.UnhandledException += new UnhandledExceptionEventHandler(UnHandleException);
00056 
00057             //Write Startup Banner
00058             WriteBanner();
00059 
00060             //InGame Command System
00061             Log.normal("Initialization of InGame Command.\r\n");
00062             //Command.Init();
00063             
00064             //Console System, Purpose for MultiThreading the Console Input
00065             Log.normal("Initialization of Console Command.\r\n");
00066             ThreadCaptureConsoleCommand.Start();
00067 
00068             //Create Object for All Configured Server
00069             Log.normal("Loading Servers Config.\r\n");
00070             Session.LoadServerConfig();
00071             Log.normal("Initialize Servers Object.\r\n");
00072             //Session.InitializeServerList();
00073 
00074             Log.normal("Starting Normal Operation!\r\n");
00075             #region MainThread update
00076             uint TimerLogFlush = 0;
00077             while (MainRun)
00078             {
00079                 //Timer Thing
00080                 diff = (uint)(DateTime.Now.Ticks - ticks) / 10000; //Diff in MS
00081                 ticks = DateTime.Now.Ticks;
00082 
00083                 TimerLogFlush += diff;
00084                 if (TimerLogFlush > 8000)
00085                 {
00086                     TimerLogFlush = 0;
00087                     sLog.flush();
00088                 }
00089                 
00090                 //update This Thread Process
00091                 Session.update(diff);
00092 
00093                 //Slow down Operation , so cpu usage don't become a probleme.
00094                System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(sleep);
00095             }
00096             #endregion
00097                 }
00098         private static void WriteBanner()
00099         {
00100             //Opening Banner
00101             Log.normal("              _____                             _      _____      __  \r\n");
00102             Log.normal("              /    )         ,                  /      /    '   /    )\r\n");
00103             Log.normal("          ---/----/---)__-------------__-------/------/__-------\\-----\r\n");
00104             Log.normal("            /    /   /   ) /   | /  /___)     /      /           \\    \r\n");
00105             Log.normal("          _/____/___/_____/____|/__(___ _____/____/_/________(____/___\r\n");
00106             Log.normal("                                                                  v0.1\r\n");
00107             //Program.log.normal("                                                                      \r\n");       
00108             Log.normal("                    _______________________________________\r\n");
00109             Log.normal("                          __                               \r\n");
00110             Log.normal("                        /    )                             \r\n");
00111             Log.normal("                    ----\\--------__---)__---------__---)__-\r\n");
00112             Log.normal("                         \\     /___) /   ) | /  /___) /   )\r\n");
00113             Log.normal("                    _(____/___(___ _/______|/__(___ _/_____\r\n");
00114             Log.normal("\r\n");
00115             Log.normal("\r\n");
00116         }
00117         private static void CaptureConsoleCommand()
00118         {
00119             string consoleText;
00120             while (MainRun)
00121             {
00122                 consoleText = Console.ReadLine();
00123                 if (consoleText != null && consoleText.Length < 1) continue;
00124                 switch (consoleText)
00125                 {
00126                     case "exit": CommandConsole.Exit(); break;
00127                     default: Log.error("Unknow Command: " + consoleText + "\r\n"); break;
00128                 }
00129                 System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(sleep);
00130             }
00131         }
00132         private static void ConsoleExitTimer()
00133         {
00134             Log.error("Exiting into 10 seconds.\r\n");
00135             System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(5000);
00136 
00137             byte secondeBeforeExit = 5;
00138             while(secondeBeforeExit > 0)
00139             {
00140                 Console.Clear();
00141                 Log.error("Exiting into " + --secondeBeforeExit + " seconds.\r\n");
00142                 System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(1000);
00143             }
00144         }
00145         private static void UnHandleException(object sender, UnhandledExceptionEventArgs args)
00146         {
00147             Exception error = (Exception)args.ExceptionObject;
00148             Log.error("If you closed Disgracefully, please next time, type \"exit\".\r\n");
00149             Log.error("UnHandleException: " + error.Message + "\r\n");
00150             Session.exit();
00151             ConsoleExitTimer();
00152             ThreadCaptureConsoleCommand.Abort();
00153             sLog.flush();
00154             MainRun = false;
00155             System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(1000);
00156             System.Environment.Exit(0);
00157         }
00158         private static void DisgraceExit(object sender, ConsoleCancelEventArgs args)
00159         {
00160             args.Cancel = true;
00161             Session.exit();
00162             Log.error("Application has been closed Disgracefully, please next time, type \"exit\".\r\n");
00163             ConsoleExitTimer();
00164             ThreadCaptureConsoleCommand.Abort();
00165             sLog.flush();
00166             MainRun = false;
00167             System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(1000);
00168             System.Environment.Exit(-1);
00169         }
00170         private static bool DisgraceExit(Ctrl_Types ctrlType)
00171         {
00172             Session.exit();
00173             Log.error("Application has been closed Disgracefully, please next time, type \"exit\".\r\n");
00174             ConsoleExitTimer();
00175             ThreadCaptureConsoleCommand.Abort();
00176             sLog.flush();
00177             MainRun = false;
00178             System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(1000);
00179             System.Environment.Exit(-1);
00180             return true;
00181         }
00182         public static void Exit()
00183         {
00184             MainRun = false;
00185             
00186             Session.exit();
00187             sLog.flush();
00188 
00189             System.Environment.Exit(0);
00190         }
00191     }
